00002 #define COLORHEX_H_

00004 #include <string>
00005 #include <ostream>
00006 #include <iostream>
00007 
00008 using std::string;
00009 using namespace std;
00010 
00011 namespace TenUI {
00012         
00013         class ColorHex {
00014         private:
00015                 float colorv[4];
00016                 
00017                 int hexCharToInt(char c){
00018                         if(c <= '9' && c >= '0'){
00019                                 return (int)c-'0';
00020                         }else if(c <= 'F' && c >= 'A'){
00021                                 return (int)c-'A'+11;
00022                         }else if(c <= 'f' && c >= 'a'){
00023                                 return (int)c-'a'+11;
00024                         }
00025                         return 0;
00026                 }
00027                 
00028                 string intToChar(int val){
00029                         if(val <= 9 && val >= 0){
00030                                 return string(1,val+'0');
00031                         }else if(val <= 16 && val >= 10){
00032                                 return string(1,(val-10)+'A');
00033                         }else{
00034                                 return string("0");
00035                         }
00036                 }
00037 
00038         public:
00039                 static const ColorHex NoColor;
00040                 
00041         public:
00042                 ColorHex(const ColorHex &b){
00043                         colorv[0] = b.colorv[0];
00044                         colorv[1] = b.colorv[1];
00045                         colorv[2] = b.colorv[2];
00046                         colorv[3] = b.colorv[3];
00047                 }
00048         
00049                 ColorHex(float r, float g, float b, float a=1.0){
00050                         colorv[0] = r;
00051                         colorv[1] = g;
00052                         colorv[2] = b;
00053                         colorv[3] = a;
00054                 }
00055                         
00056                 ColorHex(const string &ch){
00057                         setColor(ch);
00058                 }
00059                 
00060                 ColorHex(){
00061                         colorv[0] = 0.0;
00062                         colorv[1] = 0.0;
00063                         colorv[2] = 0.0;
00064                         colorv[3] = 0.0;
00065                 }
00066                                 
00067                 const ColorHex& operator =(const ColorHex& ch){
00068                         colorv[0] = ch.colorv[0];
00069                         colorv[1] = ch.colorv[1];
00070                         colorv[2] = ch.colorv[2];
00071                         colorv[3] = ch.colorv[3];
00072                         return (*this);
00073                 }
00074                 
00075                 bool operator ==(const ColorHex& ch2) const {
00076                         if(     ch2.colorv[0] == colorv[0] &&
00077                                 ch2.colorv[1] == colorv[1] &&
00078                                 ch2.colorv[2] == colorv[2] &&
00079                                 ch2.colorv[3] == colorv[3]){
00080                                 return true;
00081                         }
00082                         return false;
00083                 }
00084                 
00085 
00086                 bool operator!=(const ColorHex& ch2) const {
00087                         return !((*this)==ch2);
00088                 }
00089                 
00090                 string toString(){
00091                         string result("#");
00092                         for(unsigned int i=0; i < 3; ++i){
00093                                 int c = (int)(colorv[i]*255.0); 
00094                                 int hex1 = c>>4;
00095                                 int hex2 = c - (hex1<<4);
00096                                 
00097                                 result += intToChar(hex1);
00098                                 result += intToChar(hex2);                                                              
00099                         }
00100                         return result;
00101                 }
00102                 
00103                 void setColor(const string &ch){
00104                         if(ch.at(0) == '#'){
00105                                 if(ch.size() == 7){
00106                                         for(int i=0; i<3; ++i){
00107                                                 colorv[i] = ((float)(hexCharToInt(ch.at(i*2+1))*16+hexCharToInt(ch.at(i*2+2))))/255.0;
00108                                         }
00109                                 }else if(ch.size() == 4){
00110                                         for(int i=0; i<3; ++i){
00111                                                 colorv[i] = ((float)(hexCharToInt(ch.at(i+1))))/16.0;
00112                                         }
00113                                 }
00114                         }else{
00115                                 colorv[0] = 0;
00116                                 colorv[1] = 0;
00117                                 colorv[2] = 0;
00118                         }
00119                         colorv[3] = 1.0;
00120                 }       
00121         
00122                 float getRed() const {
00123                         return colorv[0];
00124                 }
00125                 float getGreen() const {
00126                         return colorv[1];
00127                 }
00128                 float getBlue() const {
00129                         return colorv[2];
00130                 }
00131                 float getAlpha() const {
00132                         return colorv[3];
00133                 }
00134                 
00135                 void setRed(float r){
00136                         colorv[0] = r;
00137                 }
00138                 void setGreen(float g){
00139                         colorv[1] = g;
00140                 }
00141                 void setBlue(float b){
00142                         colorv[2] = b;
00143                 }
00144                 void setAlpha(float a){
00145                         colorv[3] = a;
00146                 }
00147                 const ColorHex& multModifyAlpha(float a){
00148                         colorv[3] *= a;
00149                         return (*this);
00150                 }
00151                 
00152                 virtual ~ColorHex(){};
00153 
00154         };
